nodes.text: Osk-Trill was the homeworld of Senator Gall Trayvis. Trayvis represented the world in the Imperial Senate.

Osk-Trill was mentioned in an excerpt of the novel Leia, Princess of Alderaan published in paperback editions of the novel Lost Stars. In the final version of the novel, however, Gall Trayvis was replaced by Cinderon Malpe of Derella. The name, Osk-Trill, is the Aurebesh name for the English letters O and T, respectively, which is often used as an abbreviation for the "original trilogy" of Episodes IV, V, and VI.
